Uses of Class
shared.exceptions.InsufficentSupplies

  • Packages that use InsufficentSupplies 
    Package Description
    shared.model  

    • Uses of InsufficentSupplies in shared.model

      Methods in shared.model that throw InsufficentSupplies 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Model.canBuildCity(VertexLocation location, int playerIndex)
      Checks if a player has a city, the resources to build this city and if it is in a valid location on the map.
      boolean Model.canBuildRoad(EdgeLocation location)
      Checks if a player has a road, the resources to build this road, if it is in a valid location on the map, and if the player has a road left to play
      boolean Model.canBuildSettlement(VertexLocation location, int playerIndex)
      Checks if a player has a settlement to build, the resources to build this settlement and if it is in a valid location on the map.
      void DevCardList.removeMonopoly()
      If there is at least one monopoly card, removes it from list.
      void DevCardList.removeRoadBuilding()
      If there is at least one road building card, removes it from list.
      void DevCardList.removeSoldier()
      If there is at least one soldier card, removes it from list.
      void DevCardList.removeYearOfPlenty()
      If there is at least one year of plenty card, removes it from list.
